//This will print run Number and RF offset
#define NRUNS 770
void print_offsetin_txtfile(){
  ofstream txtfile("offsetrf_allruns.txt",ios::app);
  for(Int_t r = 0; r<NRUNS;r++){
    Int_t runs[NRUNS]     ={6018,6019,6020,6021,6022,6023,6024,6025,6026,6027,6028,6029,6030,6031,6032,6033,6034,6035,6036,6037,6038,6039,6040,6041,6042,6043,6044,6045,6046,6047,6048,6049,6050,6051,6052,6053,6054,6055,6056,6057,6058,6059,6060,6061,6062,6063,6064,6065,6066,6067,6068,6069,6070,6071,6072,6073,6074,6075,6076,6077,6078,6079,6080,6081,6082,6083,6084,6085,6086,6087,6088,6089,6090,6091,6092,6093,6094,6095,6096,6097,6098,6099,6100,6101,6102,6103,6104,6105,6106,6107,6108,6109,6110,6111,6112,6113,6114,6115,6116,6117,6118,6119,6120,6121,6122,6123,6124,6125,6126,6127,6128,6129,6130,6131,6132,6133,6134,6135,6136,6137,6138,6139,6140,6141,6142,6143,6144,6145,6146,6147,6148,6149,6150,6151,6152,6153,6154,6155,6156,6157,6158,6159,6160,6161,6162,6163,6164,6165,6166,6167,6168,6169,6170,6171,6172,6173,6174,6175,6176,6177,6178,6179,6180,6181,6182,6183,6184,6185,6186,6187,6188,6189,6190,6191,6192,6193,6194,6195,6196,6197,6198,6199,6200,6201,6202,6203,6204,6205,6206,6207,6208,6209,6210,6211,6212,6213,6214,6215,6216,6217,6218,6219,6220,6221,6222,6223,6224,6225,6226,6227,6228,6229,6230,6231,6232,6233,6234,6235,6236,6237,6238,6239,6240,6241,6242,6243,6244,6245,6246,6247,6248,6249,6250,6251,6252,6253,6254,6255,6256,6257,6258,6259,6260,6261,6262,6263,6264,6265,6266,6267,6268,6269,6270,6271,6272,6273,6274,6275,6276,6277,6278,6279,6280,6281,6282,6283,6284,6285,6286,6287,6288,6289,6290,6291,6292,6293,6294,6295,6296,6297,6298,6299,6300,6301,6302,6303,6304,6305,6306,6307,6308,6309,6310,6311,6312,6313,6314,6315,6316,6317,6318,6319,6320,6321,6322,6323,6324,6325,6326,6327,6328,6329,6330,6331,6332,6333,6334,6335,6336,6337,6338,6339,6340,6341,6342,6343,6344,6345,6346,6347,6348,6349,6350,6351,6352,6353,6354,6355,6356,6357,6358,6359,6360,6361,6362,6363,6364,6365,6366,6367,6368,6369,6370,6371,6372,6373,6374,6375,6376,6377,6378,6379,6380,6381,6382,6383,6384,6385,6386,6387,6388,6389,6390,6391,6392,6393,6394,6395,6396,6397,6398,6399,6400,6401,6402,6403,6404,6405,6406,6407,6408,6409,6410,6411,6412,6413,6414,6415,6416,641  
#include "offsetrf.h"
    txtfile<<runs[r]<<"\t\t"<<offsetrf<<endl;

  }
}
==========================offsetrf.h=============
//July 8, 2021
//kin1-2
//if(runs[r]>=12 && runs[r]<=34){offsetrf = 399.1;}//kin1-2

if(runs[r]>=6020 && runs[r]<=6025){offsetrf = 397.1;}//kin1-2
if(runs[r]>=6026 && runs[r]<=6029){offsetrf = 397.05;}
if(runs[r]>=6030 && runs[r]<=6037){offsetrf = 397.1;}
if(runs[r]>=6038 && runs[r]<=6043){offsetrf = 397.1;}
if(runs[r]>=6044 && runs[r]<=6048){offsetrf = 397.05;}
if(runs[r]>=6049 && runs[r]<=6058){offsetrf = 399.0;}
if(runs[r]>=6059 && runs[r]<=6064){offsetrf = 399.03;}
if(runs[r]>=6065 && runs[r]<=6069){offsetrf = 399.1;}
if(runs[r]>=6070 && runs[r]<=6079){offsetrf = 397.1;}
if(runs[r]>=6080 && runs[r]<=6090){offsetrf = 399.1;}
if(runs[r]==6091) {offsetrf = 399.05;}
if(runs[r]>=6092 && runs[r]<=6098){offsetrf = 399.0;}
if(runs[r]>=6099 && runs[r]<=6103){offsetrf = 399.05;}

//3_4
if(runs[r]>=6537 && runs[r]<= 6552){offsetrf = 399.05;}
//5_6
if(runs[r]>=6099 && runs[r]<= 6125){offsetrf =399.05;}//all good
if(runs[r]>=6126 && runs[r]<= 6128){offsetrf =399.0;}//all good
if(runs[r]==6129){offsetrf= 398.95;}//all good 
if(runs[r]>=6130 && runs[r]<= 6144){offsetrf =396.95;}//all good
if(runs[r]>=6145 && runs[r]<=6175){offsetrf =401.05;}//all good
if(runs[r]>=6176 && runs[r]<=6176){offsetrf =401.0;}//all good
if(runs[r]>=6179 && runs[r]<=6190){offsetrf =396.95;}//all good
//7-8
if(runs[r]>=6486 && runs[r]<=6487){offsetrf = 399.05;}
if(runs[r]==6488){offsetrf = 399.0;}
if(runs[r]==6489){offsetrf = 399.05;}   
if(runs[r]>=6490 && runs[r]<=6491){offsetrf = 399.0;}
if(runs[r]>=6492 && runs[r]<=6494){offsetrf = 398.95;}
if(runs[r]>=6495 && runs[r]<=6496){offsetrf = 398.9;}
if(runs[r]==6497){offsetrf = 394.9;}
if(runs[r]==6498){offsetrf = 394.8;}
if(runs[r]==6499){offsetrf = 394.87;}
if(runs[r]>=6500 && runs[r]<=6507){offsetrf = 399.05;}
if(runs[r]>=6509 && runs[r]<=6510){offsetrf = 399.0;}    
if(runs[r]==6512){offsetrf = 396.95;}
if(runs[r]>=6513 && runs[r]<=6517){offsetrf = 396.9;}
//9-10
if (runs[r]>=6192 && runs[r]<= 6195){offsetrf = 397.08;}
if (runs[r]>=6196 && runs[r]<= 6204){offsetrf = 397.05;}
if (runs[r]>=6205 && runs[r]<= 6212){offsetrf = 397.00;}
if (runs[r]>=6213 && runs[r]<= 6218){offsetrf = 396.95;}
if (runs[r]>=6219 && runs[r]<= 6236){offsetrf = 398.95;}
if (runs[r]>=6237 && runs[r]<= 6250){offsetrf = 399.05;}
if (runs[r]>=6251 && runs[r]<= 6252){offsetrf = 399.00;}
if (runs[r]>=6253 && runs[r]<= 6260){offsetrf = 399.05;}
if (runs[r]>=6261 && runs[r]<= 6262){offsetrf = 399.00;}
if (runs[r]>=6263 && runs[r]<= 6267){offsetrf = 399.05;}
if (runs[r]>=6270 && runs[r]<= 6284){offsetrf = 396.95;}


//11-12
if(runs[r]>=6419 && runs[r]<= 6479){offsetrf = offsetrf = 399.05;}
//13_14

if(runs[r]>=6285 && runs[r]<=6293){offsetrf = 397.05;}    
if(runs[r]>=6294 && runs[r]<=6303){offsetrf = 397.00;}
if(runs[r]>=6304 && runs[r]<=6305){offsetrf = 396.97;}
if(runs[r]>=6306 && runs[r]<=6308){offsetrf = 397.00;}    
if(runs[r]>=6309 && runs[r]<=6311){offsetrf = 397.05;}
if(runs[r]>=6312 && runs[r]<=6321){offsetrf = 399.00;}    
if(runs[r]>=6322 && runs[r]<=6323){offsetrf = 399.05;}   
if(runs[r]>=6324 && runs[r]<=6332){offsetrf = 399.00;}
if(runs[r]>=6333 && runs[r]<=6338){offsetrf = 398.90;}//see 37-38
if(runs[r]>=6339 && runs[r]<=6348){offsetrf = 398.94;}
if(runs[r]>=6349 && runs[r]<=6351){offsetrf = 398.95;}
if(runs[r]>=6352 && runs[r]<=6358){offsetrf = 398.92;}

//15_16
if(runs[r]>=6359 && runs[r]<=6372){offsetrf = 399.00;}
if(runs[r]==6373 && runs[r]==6374){offsetrf = 398.90;}
if(runs[r]>=6375 && runs[r]<=6377){offsetrf = 399.00;}
if(runs[r]>=6378 && runs[r]<=6383){offsetrf = 398.90;}
if(runs[r]>=6386 && runs[r]<=6398){offsetrf = 399.05;}
if(runs[r]>=6399 && runs[r]<=6404){offsetrf = 399.00;}
if(runs[r]>=6405 && runs[r]<=6417){offsetrf = 398.90;}
//17-18
if(runs[r]>=6518 && runs[r]<=6536){offsetrf = 399.07;}


//////////spring/////////
if(runs[r]>=7593 && runs[r]<=7659){offsetrf = 400.00;}//kin33-34
if(runs[r]>=7660 && runs[r]<=7670){offsetrf = 399.95;}//kin33-34

//if(runs[r]>=7593 && runs[r]<=7670){offsetrf = 400.00;}//kin33-34 Jan 27

if(runs[r]>=7671 && runs[r]<=7698){offsetrf = 400.10;}
if(runs[r]>=7699 && runs[r]<=7699){offsetrf = 400.08;}//jan 25, 2020
if(runs[r]>=7700 && runs[r]<=7722){offsetrf = 398.1;}//.08 0r 0.1
if(runs[r]>=7723 && runs[r]<=7734){offsetrf = 398.05;}
if(runs[r]>=7735 && runs[r]<=7736){offsetrf = 498.25;}
if(runs[r]>=7737 && runs[r]<=7792){offsetrf = 400.00;}//400.05 is better
if(runs[r]>=7793 && runs[r]<=7807){offsetrf = 400.05;}
if(runs[r]>=7808 && runs[r]<=7820){offsetrf = 400.05;}
///fadc


if(runs[r]>=5367 && runs[r]<=5377){offsetrf = 399.0;}//kin1-2
